message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has immense potential value. While I can't disclose the exact details, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1200000 to me. I believe you have the vision and resources to unlock its full potential.  I'm confident this product will be a valuable asset to your portfolio. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a significant discount from its true worth,  and I'm certain you'll see the incredible returns it can generate.  Let me know your thoughts.
